amendatorysection.catchline: Parking authority; alienating or encumbering property; pledging credit; levy of tax; prohibited; when.
amendatorysection.para: Nothing in the Parking Authority Law shall be construed (1) as granting to the authority any power to alienate or encumber any real property belonging to the state or any of its political subdivisions, (2) to grant to the authority any right or power to pledge the credit of the State of Nebraska, or any of its subdivisions, or (3) to give the authority any power to levy or assess taxes.
